entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
